attributes.action: Leave means leave, don’t allow remainers to ruin our democracy
attributes.additional_details: All leavers, let’s band together and show the UK that we do not want our democracy challenged, and we also are a force to be reckoned with.
attributes.background: It seems the remainers have now come out in full force to stop a brexit that has been voted for democratically. These people are trying to ruin that because they didn’t get their own way. Calling on people who chose to leave to sign this petition to combat the growing criticism. Leave means leave.
